FULL-STACK DEVELOPMENT INTERN

WWAC , Remote | Jul 2023 - Aug 2023

Successfully integrated the essential elements of a web application for managing agricultural consultations, in particular dashboard interface, a notification system and a Consultation Agenda.

FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT INTERN

MSK Technologies , Remote | Jun 2022 - Aug 2022

Developed necessary interfaces for a Business solutions platform dedicated to a beauty salon
